NCT Corporation: Sales Manager

18 June 2012

Founded in 2008, NCT Corporation was originally named Nhaccuatui Corporation based on its first product  "nhaccuatui.com", the top music website in Vietnam. Everyday, the site welcomes approximately 2 million unique visits and is currently one of the top-in-mind site among internet users in Vietnam.  NTC has expanded its business with two other portals which are Nava.vn, a B2C website and Viss.vn, an online dating platform.

More information on NTC can be found at: http://nctcorp.vn/

Job descriptions:</strong>

  • Plan advertising sales yearly and quarterly</li>
  • Plan business operation including budget, target customers, banking, human resources, wages, incentives, and revenue targets for each team</li>
  • Support teams in dealing with important customers to increase revenue</li>
  • Plan sales strategies: allowances and promotions.</li>
  • Report monthly and quarterly revenue to higher managers</li>
  • Conduct market research and make marketing recommendations on how to target key customers</li>
  • Research and analyse online marketing and customer behaviours to provide the best solutions for marketing.</li>
  • Develop and maintain relationships with customers.</li>
  • Location: Ho Chi Minh City</li>
    </ul>
    Requirements:</strong>

    • Aged 28-35, graduated in Marketing, Commerce or related disciplines.</li>
    • Minimum 3 years experience in sales</li>
    • Minimum 1 year experience as sales manager</li>
    • Passion for sales and online projects.</li>
    • Experience in working with Advertising Agency or Digital Advertising Agency preferably.</li>
      </ul>
       </strong>
